TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
Kelthurax
WHO DISTURBS THE SLEEP OF KELTHURAX?
WHO DISTURBS THE SLEEP OF KELTHURAX?
WHO DISTURBS THE SLEEP OF KELTHURAX?
WHO DISTURBS THE SLEEP OF KELTHURAX?
I do, Lord Kelthurax. I am bound by my oath as a Dragonknight to report the death of my companion, Crystal.
I do, Lord Kelthurax. I am bound by my oath as a Dragonknight to report the death of my companion, Crystal.
I do, Lord Kelthurax. I am bound by my oath as a Dragonknight to report the death of my companion, Crystal.
I do, Lord Kelthurax. I am bound by my oath as a Dragonknight to report the death of my companion, Crystal.
OATHS AND DRAGONKNIGHTS ARE JUST FOOLISH WORDS AND TITLES. WHY DO YOU BOTHER ME WITH SUCH TRIVIAL THINGS?
OATHS AND DRAGONKNIGHTS ARE JUST FOOLISH WORDS AND TITLES. WHY DO YOU BOTHER ME WITH SUCH TRIVIAL THINGS?
OATHS AND DRAGONKNIGHTS ARE JUST FOOLISH WORDS AND TITLES. WHY DO YOU BOTHER ME WITH SUCH TRIVIAL THINGS?
OATHS AND DRAGONKNIGHTS ARE JUST FOOLISH WORDS AND TITLES. WHY DO YOU BOTHER ME WITH SUCH TRIVIAL THINGS?
You are the last Dragon left, Lord Kelthurax. There is none other to report to.
You are the last Dragon left, Lord Kelthurax. There is none other to report to.
You are the last Dragon left, Lord Kelthurax. There is none other to report to.
You are the last Dragon left, Lord Kelthurax. There is none other to report to.
THE DRAGONS WILL RETURN, GIRL. THEY ALWAYS DO. AND WHEN THEY DO, GO BOTHER THEM WITH YOUR WORDS.
THE DRAGONS WILL RETURN, GIRL. THEY ALWAYS DO. AND WHEN THEY DO, GO BOTHER THEM WITH YOUR WORDS.
THE DRAGONS WILL RETURN, GIRL. THEY ALWAYS DO. AND WHEN THEY DO, GO BOTHER THEM WITH YOUR WORDS.
THE DRAGONS WILL RETURN, GIRL. THEY ALWAYS DO. AND WHEN THEY DO, GO BOTHER THEM WITH YOUR WORDS.
Lord Kelthurax, I request another mount to join with me now that Crystal is gone. Since there are no others, I must request that you be my mount.
Lord Kelthurax, I request another mount to join with me now that Crystal is gone. Since there are no others, I must request that you be my mount.
Lord Kelthurax, I request another mount to join with me now that Crystal is gone. Since there are no others, I must request that you be my mount.
Lord Kelthurax, I request another mount to join with me now that Crystal is gone. Since there are no others, I must request that you be my mount.
ME? YOU REQUEST THE GREAT KELTHURAX TO ALLOW A MORTAL TO RIDE HIM LIKE A COMMON PLOUGH-HORSE?
ME? YOU REQUEST THE GREAT KELTHURAX TO ALLOW A MORTAL TO RIDE HIM LIKE A COMMON PLOUGH-HORSE?
ME? YOU REQUEST THE GREAT KELTHURAX TO ALLOW A MORTAL TO RIDE HIM LIKE A COMMON PLOUGH-HORSE?
ME? YOU REQUEST THE GREAT KELTHURAX TO ALLOW A MORTAL TO RIDE HIM LIKE A COMMON PLOUGH-HORSE?
I do, Lord.
I do, Lord.
I do, Lord.
I do, Lord.
YOU ARE BRAVE, GIRL, I GIVE YOU THAT; BRAVE AND FOOLISH. FOR THAT I WILL SPARE YOUR LIFE. LEAVE NOW, BEFORE I CHANGE MY MIND.
YOU ARE BRAVE, GIRL, I GIVE YOU THAT; BRAVE AND FOOLISH. FOR THAT I WILL SPARE YOUR LIFE. LEAVE NOW, BEFORE I CHANGE MY MIND.
